name: 扬·诺维茨基 Jan Nowicki
intro: Jan Nowicki was born on November 5, 1939 in Kowal, Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland. He is an actor and writer, known for Sanatorium pod klepsydra (1973), Sztos (1997) and Tulipany (2004). He has been married to Malgorzata Potocka since May 2009. He was previously married to Márta Mészáros.
